title: with Boyce and Pageau: Apocalypse with Grubhub and a Stimulus Check
description:
Benjamin Boice has been sounding awfully religiony lately so I asked if he wanted to have a conversation. He said he wanted Pageau in there too because he's the REAL prophet, seeing all those patterny things. So here it is. :) 

Benjamin Boyce's channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCm13xHVNFVwzHzK3QHSaZ3Q
Jonathan Pageau's channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtCTSf3UwRU14nYWr_xm-dQ
